entry.title: Wednesday: Near blizzard. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Near blizzard. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 32 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 12:04 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 25. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 12:04 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 34 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Blowing snow late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 34 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 52 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 12:04 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
